definition: affected by a disorder of the mind
details:
adjective
- affected by a disorder of the mind
= example: affected by a disorder of the mind
- involving the mind or an intellectual process
= example: involving the mind or an intellectual process
- of or relating to the chin or median part of the lower jaw
= synonyms: genial
- of or relating to the chin- or liplike structure in insects and certain mollusks
- of or relating to the mind
= example: of or relating to the mind
